com.fr.funrungame.view.Screens

Class Controllers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fr.funrungame.view.Screens.Controllers

  • public class Controllers
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles all the user inputs from the keyboard or the touch screen.
